div.p:
Coronovirus Update:
According to the Center for Disease Control (CDC), while the students are at home, parents should teach them about healthy practices to help protect against the disease. Those lessons should include washing hands properly and staying away from people who cough and sneeze. Also, parents can disinfect doorknobs, light switches and other household surfaces that kids may touch. Go to https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/prepare/children-faq.html for additional information.
